fields.name: You should not send direct messages without consent.
fields.value: As you are a user, you should not send direct messages to fellow users or helpers on the platform without their consent. This is a violation of the platform's Terms of Service. If you have any questions, please keep all conversations with fellow users or helpers in the appropriate channel.

embeds.title: Do not send direct messages to fellow users or helpers on the platform without their consent.
embeds.description: You hereby agree that you acknowledge that you should not send direct messages to fellow users or helpers on the platform without their consent.
